Find Skilled Workers at Your Fingertips

Introducing Mera Rojgar Mera Adhikar - the solution for hiring reliable daily wage workers. Our platform connects nearby workers to daily wage work opportunities, making it easy to find the help you need. With extensive worker profiles, competitive pricing, and a user-friendly interface, our platform provides an easy booking process to get the work done. We have a dedicated customer support team and a large pool of workers, making it easy to find the help you need, whether it's short-term or long-term. Sign up today and start hiring!

A technology-first approach to finding workers

Discover convenience like never before with our exclusive digital platform tailored to meet the needs of daily wage workers. From skilled labor to household helpers, find opportunity with just a click away.

Register with Mera Rojgar Mera Adhikar

Employers, contractors, and workers can easily register on our platform by providing their details. Once registration is complete, they are directed to the app.

Login with Mobile Number and OTP

Users can log in securely using their registered mobile number and OTP. This ensures a seamless and safe login process, protecting user privacy.

Access Your Dashboard

Upon logging in, users are directed to their personalized dashboard. Here, employers can post job requirements, contractors can manage projects, and workers can explore available opportunities.

Explore Features and Requirements

Users can navigate through the app to explore various features and requirements. From browsing job listings to accessing service details, our platform offers a comprehensive experience tailored to the needs of employers, contractors, and workers.

Our Services In Action

Every day, our platform facilitates the creation of numerous job posts, catering to a wide range of industries and requirements. From construction projects to household repairs, our extensive network ensures that there’s a job opportunity for every worker. With just a few clicks, employers can post their job requirements and quickly connect with skilled workers ready to take on the task.

Once a job post is created, our efficient matching algorithm goes to work, analyzing worker profiles and skills to find the perfect match for the job. Within moments, workers receive notifications about available opportunities and can apply with ease. Our seamless process ensures that jobs are filled promptly, allowing projects to progress smoothly and efficiently
